mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cashmore, H. M. to Herman J. Doepner regarding correspondence; 03 of 06
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 41-117--Scrapbook 2Cashmore, H. M. to Herman J. Doepner regarding the archives lack of correspondence between Cashmore's predecessor, Walter Powell (who died in 1928), and Henry Faulds. Instead, copies of correspondence between Faulds and Cashmore are discussed. Enclosed: 5 letters (copies) between Faulds and Cashmore, July 20-30, 1928, regarding Stipendiary Court records.; 6 leaves; DF 870
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faulds, Henry, 18431930
